trans-unit.source: Provides a type-safe way to set the <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpCachePolicy.VaryByParams" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 提供類型安全方式來設定 <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpCachePolicy.VaryByParams" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpCachePolicy.VaryByParams%2A> property identifies which HTTP `Get` or `Post` parameters ASP.NET uses to uniquely identify a variation of the response when there are multiple cached responses for a resource.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpCachePolicy.VaryByParams%2A>屬性會識別哪一個 HTTP`Get`或`Post`ASP.NET 用來唯一識別變化的回應，當有多個資源的快取回的應的參數。

trans-unit.source: This is useful when a response depends on a set of client inputs, such as headers or parameters.
trans-unit.target: 當回應則取決於一組用戶端的輸入，例如標頭或參數時，這非常有用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpCacheVaryByParams> is not directly related to HTTP cache-control headers, but helps ensure that a client or proxy varies by the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpCacheVaryByParams> HTTP 快取控制標頭，不直接相關，但可協助確保用戶端或 proxy 因指定的參數。

trans-unit.source: For more information about `VaryByParams`, see RFC 2616: Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1, available on the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125) site.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`VaryByParams`，請參閱 RFC 2616： 超文字傳輸通訊協定-HTTP/1.1 中，用於[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 網站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)站台。

trans-unit.source: See section 14, "Header Field Definitions", for complete details.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱節 14 中，「 標頭欄位定義 」 的完整詳細資料。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how the <xref:System.Web.HttpCacheVaryByParams> object is accessed from the <xref:System.Web.HttpCachePolicy> object associated with an <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何<xref:System.Web.HttpCacheVaryByParams>從存取物件<xref:System.Web.HttpCachePolicy>物件相關聯<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpCacheVaryByParams" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpCacheVaryByParams" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of values which specify the HTTP <see langword="GET" /> or <see langword="POST" /> parameters to be used for varying the cache.
trans-unit.target: 取得值的陣列，這些值會指定要用來改變快取的 HTTP <see langword="GET" /> 或 <see langword="POST" /> 參數。

trans-unit.source: An array of values which contain the HTTP <see langword="GET" /> or <see langword="POST" /> parameters for varying the cache.
trans-unit.target: 值的陣列，其中包含用來改變快取的 HTTP <see langword="GET" /> 或 <see langword="POST" /> 參數。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an HTTP response varies by <see langword="Get" /> or <see langword="Post" /> parameters.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出 HTTP 回應是否依 <see langword="Get" /> 或 <see langword="Post" /> 參數有所不同。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if HTTP request parameters are ignored; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 HTTP 要求參數會被忽略，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Web.HttpCacheVaryByParams.IgnoreParams%2A> property to `true` is equivalent to setting the [@ OutputCache](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28a9e101-fb44-4198-9cb6-b8a52312fec2) directive `VaryByParams` attribute to "none" for the resource.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Web.HttpCacheVaryByParams.IgnoreParams%2A>屬性`true`相當於設定[@ OutputCache](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28a9e101-fb44-4198-9cb6-b8a52312fec2)指示詞`VaryByParams`屬性為"none"的資源。

trans-unit.source: The name of the custom parameter.
trans-unit.target: 自訂參數的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the cache varies according to the specified HTTP request parameter.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出快取是否依據指定的 HTTP 要求參數有所不同。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the cache should vary by the specified parameter value.
trans-unit.target: 如果快取應該依指定的參數值有所不同，則為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: When used as an accessor (getter), the <xref:System.Web.HttpCacheVaryByParams.Item%2A> indexer returns `true` if a value for the specified parameter is found in the current parameters collection, or if the collection is set to vary by * (an asterisk), which indicates all parameters.
trans-unit.target: 做為存取子 (getter)，當<xref:System.Web.HttpCacheVaryByParams.Item%2A>索引子傳回`true`如果目前的參數集合中找到指定的參數的值，或若要依設定集合 * （星號），表示所有參數。

trans-unit.source: When used as a mutator (setter), the <xref:System.Web.HttpCacheVaryByParams.Item%2A> indexer sets the value for the parameter in the parameters collection that corresponds to the specified header to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 為 mutator (setter)，使用時<xref:System.Web.HttpCacheVaryByParams.Item%2A>索引子設定參數的值集合中的參數對應至指定的標頭`true`。

trans-unit.source: The value * can be specified, which indicates all parameters.
trans-unit.target: 值 * 可以指定，表示所有參數。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how the <xref:System.Web.HttpCacheVaryByParams.Item%2A> indexer is accessed from the <xref:System.Web.HttpCachePolicy> object associated with an <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何<xref:System.Web.HttpCacheVaryByParams.Item%2A>索引子來存取從<xref:System.Web.HttpCachePolicy>物件相關聯<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="header" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="header" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An array of values which contain the HTTP <see langword="GET" /> or <see langword="POST" /> parameters for varying the cache.
trans-unit.target: 值的陣列，其中包含用來改變快取的 HTTP <see langword="GET" /> 或 <see langword="POST" /> 參數。

trans-unit.source: Sets an array of values which specify the HTTP <see langword="GET" /> or <see langword="POST" /> parameters to be used for varying the cache.
trans-unit.target: 設定值的陣列，這些值會指定要用來改變快取的 HTTP <see langword="GET" /> 或 <see langword="POST" /> 參數。
